location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Shaikh Ahmad as-Salf of Hafit [Jabal Hafeet], Na’im. Shaikh Obaid bin Juma’, Beni Ka’ab'

mods.abstract: Two black and white photographs with their subjects identified in writing below each one. The first depicts Shaikh Ahmad as-Salf of Hafit [Jabal Hafeet] of the Na’im tribe in front of a tent, while the second shows Shaikh Obaid bin Juma’ of the Beni Ka’ab tribe standing next to an unnamed companion.
